CORPORATE GOVERNANCE REPORT

Ma terial Contracts

Pursuant to Rule 1207(8) 0f the Listing Manual issued by SGX-ST, no material contract had been entered to by the Company or its subsidiaries involving the interests of the CEO, each Director or Controlling Shareholder.

Interested Party Transactions

The Company has established procedures to ensure that all transactions with interested persons are reported to the ARMC and the transactions are carried out at arm’s length and under normal commercial terms. There are no interested person transactions for the financial year ended 31 December 2017.

CODE OF CONDUCT AND PRACTICES

The Group recognises the importance of integrity, professionalism on the conduct of its business activities Employees are expected to embrace, practice and adopt these values while performing their duties and always to act in the best interest of the Group and avoid situations that may create conflicts of interest.
